question: Nazca Lines, which was seen in news recently, is located in which country?
explanation:
The famous UNESCO World Heritage Site Nazca Lines (Pampa de Nazca) is located in the South American country Peru.
The place was seen in news recently as a new figurative geoglyph related to a cat was identified, drawn on one of the slopes of this hill. The site is known for its depictions of gigantic animals, plants and imaginary beings.
